meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> carries a <radical>cross</radical> into your <kanji>soup</kanji>. Hey tsunami, I was eating that soup!
readingMnemonic: You pull the cross out of your <kanji>soup</kanji> and see that the cross' <reading>jew</reading>els (じゅう) fell off and are in there now. The jewels sparkle, shine, and dissolve into the soup!
